Articles.Content:
Avast calls it "TTF:CVE-2011-3402 [Expl]"

It threw it up while I was watching a video on Youtube, twice actually.

No idea, Avast's web shield apparently stopped it doing its thing, but I got a heck of a lot of Javascript's "Sure you want to run this?" warnings, which I all said no to, the last two weren't even in Vista's window format (this is one weak point in these kinds of viruses, they sometimes give you a format from a different OS).
